explanations.reason: The paper focuses on analyzing economic-financial risk indicators of companies with ESG seals, comparing those listed in the ISE with those on BM&FBOVESPA. The study uses quantitative and qualitative methods to analyze financial statements and indicators such as liquidity ratios and net working capital. There is no mention of any machine learning techniques, algorithms, or models in the title or abstract, nor any indication that such methods were used in the research.
